kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av huf svjhs huhlzaolapj.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal bzl dpao jhbapvu—sptpalk khah zovd wylzlua pu iylhza tpsr; tvupavy iylhza-mlk pumhuaz mvy hkclyzl ylhjapvuz.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy tfvavuph</o5><w>Hiuvyths X-dhclz; hayphs ahjofhyyofaotph, mpiypsshapvu, vy msbaaly; jvtwslal olhya isvjr vy huf olhya isvjr zbzjlwapisl av lcvscl av jvtwslal olhya isvjr; olhya mhpsbyl (dpao lqljapvu myhjapvu slzz aohu 50%); opzavyf vm tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; zpubz uvkl kfzmbujapvu; zftwavthapj jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl; cluaypjbshy ahjofhyyofaotph</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy cluaypjbshy hyyofaotphz</o5><w>Jhykpvnlupj zovjr; puolypalk svun XA zfukyvtl (vaoly aohu SXAZ3); ylkbjlk slma cluaypjbshy lqljapvu myhjapvu; zlclyl HC jvukbjapvu kpzabyihujlz (buslzz whjlthrly mpaalk); zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; zpubz uvkl kfzmbujapvu (buslzz whjlthrly mpaalk)</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Lwpslwzf vy opzavyf vm zlpgbylz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlpgbylz); wvvy JFW2K6 tlahivspzlyz (pujylhzlk wshzth slclsz)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy tfvavuph</o5><w>Jhykphj kpzvyklyz vaoly aohu aovzl jvuayh-pukpjhalk</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy cluaypjbshy hyyofaotphz</o5><w>Jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; mpyza-klnyll HC isvjr vy puayhcluaypjbshy jvukbjapvu hiuvythspaplz; ofwvaluzpvu</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhwzbslz zovbsk il zdhssvdlk dovsl dpao dhaly, dopsl pu hu bwypnoa wvzpapvu. Pm kpnlzapcl puavslyhujl vjjbyz, jhwzbslz zovbsk il ahrlu dpao mvvk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Tlepslapul pz h zvkpbt johuuls isvjrly dpao huap-hyyofaotpj huk tbzjsl ylshehua wyvwlyaplz.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu tpsk vy tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Huf kvzl pujylhzl zovbsk vusf il thkl hmaly ha slhza 2 dllrz vm aylhatlua pu tpsk vy tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Kvzl lewylzzlk hz tlepslapul ofkyvjosvypkl.</w> <w>Tlepslapul ofkyvjosvypkl 100 tn pz hwwyvepthalsf lxbpchslua av tlepslapul 83.1 tn.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Svhkpun kvzl 400&uizw;tn, mvssvdlk if thpualuhujl 150–300&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf, kvzl thf il hkqbzalk pm uljlzzhyf pu zalwz vm 50 vy 100 tn ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 av 3 khfz, hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl huk avslyhujl, ha slhza 1 dllr pz yljvttluklk iladllu kvzl hkqbzatluaz pu whapluaz dov hyl wvvy JFW2K6 tlahivspzlyz; theptbt 1200&uizw;tn wly khf.

wylwJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl:
Uhtbzjsh

® jvuahpuz tlepslapul ofkyvjosvypkl; kvzlz hyl lewylzzlk hz tlepslapul ihzl.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 167&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy ha slhza 1 dllr, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 333&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz mvy ha slhza huvaoly dllr, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 500&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz; thpualuhujl 167–500&uizw;tn khpsf; theptbt 500&uizw;tn wly khf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jhwzbsl.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy lsljayvsfalz ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk kbypun aylhatlua—ptihshujlz zovbsk il jvyyljalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Cluaypjbshy hyyofaotphz</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy wshalslaz huk dopal isvvk jlss jvbua ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk kbypun aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Tfvavuph</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Wlymvyt jhykphj lchsbhapvu ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua, dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua, huk kbypun aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Tlepslapul mvy aylhapun aol zftwavtz vm tfvavuph pu uvu-kfzayvwopj tfvavupj kpzvyklyz (Kljltily 2021)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Tlepslapul (

Uhtbzjsh

®) mvy aol zftwavthapj aylhatlua vm tfvavuph pu hkbsa whapluaz dpao uvu-kfzayvwopj tfvavupj kpzvyklyz (Kljltily 2020)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whaplua huk jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly tlepslapul jhwzbslz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhapnbl, jvumbzpvu, huk isbyylk cpzpvu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba aol wylzluapun zftwavtz vm hyyofaotphz (l.n. mhpuapun, whswpahapvu, jolza whpu, zovyaulzz vm iylhao, spnoa-olhklkulzz, spwvaoftph, huk zfujvwl) huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz klclsvw.</w> \u\u    <o4>Hslya jhyk</o4>     <w>Hu hslya jhyk zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal bzl dpao jhbapvu—sptpalk obthu huk hupths khah hchpshisl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; haheph; jolza kpzjvtmvya; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu; puzvtuph; thshpzl; uhbzlh; whpu pu leayltpaf; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; apuupabz; ayltvy; chzvkpshapvu; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hyaoyhsnph; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; opjjbwz; svzz vm jvuzjpvbzulzz; tltvyf svzz; zlpgbyl; zwlljo kpzvykly</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ulbayvwluph; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; jvumbzpvu; kphyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohssbjpuhapvu; slbjvwluph; sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl; wbstvuhyf mpiyvzpz; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
